__e: I came out here to try to listen to what you wanna say, but if all you're gonna do is scream--
I was pretending not to listen to him but I think your father was right.
I know you got no reason to listen... But I don't wanna kill you.
Like, wouldn't it be great if once, just once... I could make my mother hear me? I mean, really hear me...

I mean, to come in here and to listen to people talk and to make them feel good, and I just... I want to be sure that I'm not using you for that, you know, and that I'm not doing all the talking and the... and the good feeling and that I'm...
Here I am, willing to listen, which, if I'm gonna be honest, is more than you deserve.
I didn't come here to listen to you pretend to care about her... or me.
But now my only option is to come here and listen to you share everything about your life with this idiot.
